meanings.definition: The act of making a continuous murmuring noise.
meanings.sent1: The burblings of the stream were soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the burblings of distant voices in the hallway.
meanings.sent3: The burblings of the coffee machine seemed to have a calming effect on everyone.
meanings.sent4: Amidst the burblings of the city, she found solace in the quiet park.
meanings.sent5: The burblings of the brook echoed through the forest, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A series of low, continuous sounds.
meanings.sent1: The burblings of the old pipes kept me awake all night.
meanings.sent2: The burblings of the engine indicated a problem that needed fixing.
meanings.sent3: The burblings of the stomach after a big meal can be quite embarrassing.
meanings.sent4: In the silence of the night, the burblings of the house settling seemed amplified.
meanings.sent5: The burblings of the wind through the trees added to the eerie atmosphere of the forest.

meanings.definition: To make a continuous murmuring noise.
meanings.sent1: She burblings softly to herself while working on her art project.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends burblings happily as they walked through the park.
meanings.sent3: The baby burblings in her sleep made her parents smile.
meanings.sent4: The river burblings as it flowed over the smooth stones.
meanings.sent5: The wind burblings through the leaves created a peaceful background noise.
